rules.prepare:
EXTRA_OPTS=""
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" != "cross-tools" ]; then EXTRA_OPTS="--enable-shared --enable-plugins" fi
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "tools" ]; then EXTRA_OPTS="$EXTRA_OPTS --program-prefix=${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-" fi
cd $BOLT_BUILD_DIR $BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/configure \ --prefix="$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" \ --with-sysroot=/ \ --disable-multiarch \ --disable-multilib \ --disable-nls \ --disable-doc \ --disable-silent-rules \ --with-system-zlib \ --with-pkgversion="GNU Binutils for Bolt Linux" \ --build="$BOLT_BUILD_TYPE" \ --host="$BOLT_HOST_TYPE" \ --target="$BOLT_TARGET_TYPE" \ $EXTRA_OPTS
rules.install:
cd $BOLT_BUILD_DIR make DESTDIR=$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR install
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "target" ]; then rm "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/ld" ln -sf ld.bfd \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/ld" else rm "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-ld" ln -sf "${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-ld.bfd" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-ld" fi
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" = "cross-tools" ]; then for PROG in "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-"*; do BASENAME=`basename $PROG` SHORTNAME=`echo $BASENAME | sed "s/${BOLT_TARGET_TYPE}-//g"`
ln -sf "$BASENAME" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/$SHORTNAME" done else for i in demangle.h libiberty.h; do install -m 644 "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/include/$i" \ "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include" done fi
PKG_BINUTILS="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/binutils" PKG_BINUTILS_DEV="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/binutils-dev"
install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_BINUTILS" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_BINUTILS_DEV" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin" install -d -m 0755 "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib"
mv -v "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/"* \ "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/bin/"
mv -v "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/ldscripts" \ "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"
if [ "$BOLT_BUILD_FOR" != "cross-tools" ]; then rm -f "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"*.la
mv -v "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"libbfd-*.so \ "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/" mv -v "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"libopcodes-*.so \ "$PKG_BINUTILS/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib/"
mv -v "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/lib" \ "$PKG_BINUTILS_DEV/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/" mv -v "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/include" \ "$PKG_BINUTILS_DEV/$BOLT_INSTALL_PREFIX/" fi
